subject: Soccer
Tax Evasion
lead_paragraph: Galatasaray, the defending Turkish league champion, will pay 2.5 million euros ($2.8 million) for Podolski, a 30-year-old German, and an additional €500,000 if it qualifies for the Champions League.
snippet: Galatasaray, the defending Turkish league champion, will pay 2.5 million euros ($2.8 million) for Podolski, a 30-year-old German, and an additional €500,000 if it qualifies for the Champions League.
